body:
random information: 


please ask me all sorts of questions.

ask me for my skype.

i love to make stuff - need a logo, intro, or tshirt? i can probably do that.

i run, like, 5 youtube channels. one for music, one for hotline miami, one for gaming soon.

i was djsmiley before the name change.

fun fact: _gl stands for "good luck", indicating that you'll have a hard time fighting me or whatever.

ama!!!!!!!!

title: Hello! I am caleb. ama.

replies.body: Hello Caleb! You seem like an interesting person, hopefully I can see you in game sometime! Two questions, how did you find Avicus? Also, what's your favorite food? See you around! :)
replies.body_tagged: Hello Caleb! You seem like an interesting person, hopefully I can see you in game sometime! Two questions, how did you find Avicus? Also, what's your favorite food? See you around! :)

replies.body: Hey man, do you watch tv shows, if so, what shows do you watch?
replies.body_tagged: Hey man, do you watch tv shows, if so, what shows do you watch?

replies.body:
I found avicus through friends - luis and jorge. they don't play anymore, and I love avicus even more!

My favorite food, though kind of general, is sushi. It it just a blessing, honestly.

See you brit!

replies.body:
I only watch The Walking Dead, honestly. It's the best, since i read the comics beforehand.

I was watching House of Cars .. and, well, without spoilers, a couple twists through me off of it. I'm taking a break now :P

So only the walking dead.
